channel.title: How do I put requirements on armor?
channel.description: I have been trying to add defence requirements to my Torso, Claws, Initiate, and Berserker helms for a while now, and nothing seems to be working correctly. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

item.description:

I have been trying to add defence requirements to my Torso, Claws, Initiate, and Berserker helms for a while now, and nothing seems to be working correctly. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
